Description: Quartzite cone-shaped artefact, maybe a kind of hammer (?), if not a weight (?), with a rounded edge at the base and a tapering top, which has broken away and is missing. The surface of the base has been polished and the shallow irregular round cupule hollowed in its center might result from the use of the item as a hammer
Bibliographic references: Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.77, p.185, pl.27)
